data.text: @Tom64397504 Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.

@Tom64397504 Thank you for reaching us, our website is operative and ready to complete your purchase, however, it can be affected by browser's cookies and temporary files, we suggest you to delete them and try again, if the problem remains, please let us know via DM. Kind regards.
@yourEadvisor Due to you made the purchase of your ticket with a travel agency, you have to contact them. Regards.
@OfficialZazaK Hi, we sent you a message via DM. Regards.
@yourEadvisor Hi, if you purchased your ticket through a travel agency, you will have to contact them in order to request the reimbursement. Regards.
@yourEadvisor Hi, if you have a ticket that belongs to a travel agency, you need to contact them to request your refund. Regards.
@erin_r_dooley Hello, in order to provide you a better assistance. Please send us the complete passenger's name and booking code through DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@JacobBrehme We replied to the message you sent via DM.

@JacobBrehme Hello, thank you for reaching us, bear in mind that the transference is still in process, and due to the high demand, the reimbursement process are taking longer than normal. We are working to give you a solution as soon as possible. Kind regards.

@Tom64397504 Hello, thank you for reaching us, we do have flights available operating on Brazil, you can verify our routes through the following link: https://t.co/m31QdIbhsC. If you require further assistance don't hesitate to contact us via DM. Kind regards.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @Christo39906632 Hola, por favor envíanos por DM el código de reserva o número de ticket y nombre completo del pasajero. Estaremos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@GeorgeMo We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@GeorgeMo We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@Rosemarie_says We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@Rosemarie_says Hi, our refund process has changed. Please send us a DM with your full name and ticket number. Regards.

@JacobBrehme Hi, we have check your reimbursement and it is still in payment process. Due to the current situation and the high refund requests, it is taking more than expected. Your patience is highly appreciated. Kind regards.
@JacobBrehme Hello, we really understand your position. Once we have any update of your case. We'll contact you. Regards.
We are grateful to the LATAM maintenance team that strives every day to give the best care to our fleet so that tomorrow we can do what we like most: Flying #FurtherTogether https://t.co/mA1I0wVFwk
@JacobBrehme Your case is still being worked on. Once we have an update, we will let you know through your email, regards.
@rossycussi61 Hello, here https://t.co/eKYS5f4bZ0 you can find more information about the routes and flights available. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: For your safety and that of our personnel, we highly recommend the use of face masks during check-in, boarding and throughout your flight. From May 11th, the use of face masks will become mandatory at all times. For more information: https://t.co/sTDmQi4LXa https://t.co/dlU3mNSTKn
@erixeneize_jrr ...el exterior, ingresar sus datos en el siguiente link:   https://t.co/lHh195Jis1     Los vuelos especiales serán evaluados y autorizados por las autoridades del país. Saludos.
@erixeneize_jrr  Hola Román, Debido a la pandemia de COVID-19 (Coronavirus) la operación desde y hacia argentina se encuentra suspendida Sugerimos a todos los pasajeros de la Compañía varados en...

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @JacobBrehme We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@JacobBrehme We are working on your refund, please wait for our contact by email. Regards.
@JacobBrehme Hi, your refund is in process and it will take longer due the actual situation. Regards.
@JacobBrehme Hi, your case is under process and we added your comments to it. We'll contact you as soon as possible.
@RBReich Hi Robert, our refund process has changed. But if your ticket belongs to a travel agency, they have to process it. Regards.

data.text: @bar_tramunt Hola, te hemos enviado un mensaje vía DM. Saludos.
@JacobBrehme We've replied through DM, regards.

#AttentionPassengers: For your safety and the one of our collaborators, we highly recommend the use of masks from the moment of check-in, on boarding and throughout the whole flight. Learn more at https://t.co/sTDmQi4LXa
@JacobBrehme We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@elissajosee We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@elissajosee We want to assist you, please provide the information we are requesting through DM. Regards.

@elissajosee Hi, through this means we can assist you, in order to do so, please provide via DM the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. You can also provide the case number and your email. We'll be awaiting your response.

#AttentionPassengers: We want to make travel easier for those who need it most. If you are flying to Chile or Brazil, please check the government entry restrictions. For more information visit: https://t.co/YApW7bBnjP https://t.co/vUEMhgWZFw

data.text: @bambinaa Hello, in order to assist you with this situation, let us know via DM your case number, ticket number and full passenger's name. We look forward to hearing from you. Regards.
@opticaparodi Nos verificamos que la compra haya sido realizada directamente con nosotros, por lo que deberás ponerte en contacto con tu agencia de viajes. Saludos.

@opticaparodi Verificamos ambas reservas fueron adquiridas a través de una agencia de viajes por lo que será necesario que puedas comunicarte con ellos a fin de obtener el reembolso. Lamentamos no poder asistirte en esta oportunidad. Saludos.
@opticaparodi Juan, debido a que la información es personal y confidencial es necesario que puedas enviarnos los datos por mensaje directo. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@EdMRobinson Hi, send us your booking code and full name through a DM to verify your information. We await your reply.

@opticaparodi Sugerimos que puedas eliminar tu respuesta debido a que cuenta con información importante y confidencial de tus reserva. Envíanos la información solicitada por DM. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@opticaparodi A fin de poder confirmar lo que nos indicas, por favor, envíanos por DM el código de tu reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos). Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@opticaparodi Nos gustaría asistirte, pero si el ticket pertenece a una agencia de viajes, ellos deben procesar la devolución. Si necesitan asistencia, nos contactarán de manera interna. Saludos.
@opticaparodi Hola, si el ticket pertenece a una agencia de viajes, debes comunicarte con ellos para solicitar la devolución. Si tienes más dudas, envíanos un DM con el número  de ticket. Saludos.
@lostaloha Hi, in this case, we suggest contacting your travel agency support. Regards.
@BPayneBarbosa Hello, in order to assist you. Please send us the complete passenger's name, booking code and more details of your request through DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@elliott1217 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@elliott1217 We have sent you a DM. Regards.

We want you to travel with peace of mind. Learn about the health and safety measures we are taking to protect you when you travel with us. For more information, please visit https://t.co/vHBr8s63P6. #FurtherTogether https://t.co/nI7gUr7izE

data.text: @juzeitune Hello, we didn't receive the information. Please send it again through DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.

@Robby_Current There's no record of previous messages via Twitter. To assist you, it's necessary that you send us via DM the information we requested. Keep in mind that it is needed in order to look for your reservation. We'll be waiting for your response.

data.text: @Robby_Current Hi, in order to provide you further assistance, please let us know via DM your full name, the email address associated with the reservation, your identification number /issuance country and the bank statements picture where it shows the charges. We will be waiting for your reply.
@juzeitune Hi, to assist you, please confirm via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. Thank you for contacting us. We'll be waiting for your response.
@shimousasougou Hi, please send us a DM with your full name, ticket number and travel voucher number. Regards.

@KathrynHurlbut Hi, to assist you, it's necessary that you give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passengers. Thank you for contacting us. We'll be waiting for your response.
@RealRuissan The purchase was made with a travel agency, so the refund needs to be requested to them. We look forward to assisting you with future requests. Regards.

@RealRuissan In this case, we must reiterate our previous response. In order to request the refund, you need to contact the travel agency. We look forward to assisting you with future requests. Regards.
@Madeline4884 Hi, to give you more information, send us via DM your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We await your reply.

@RealRuissan Hi, since you made the purchase through a travel agency, meaning that you made the payment to them, it's necessary that you request the refund directly with them. We look forward to assisting you with future requests. Regards.
@amberlesaux Hello Amber, if your ticket was purchased through a travel agency you must contact them to request the refund. Regards.
@MP87366058 We've replied through DM, regards.

Today we bring you the story of how we transported life and hope from Brazil to Argentina on an exceptional flight. Thanks to the commitment of each one of the people who took part because they ensure that the world keeps on dreaming #FurtherTogether https://t.co/Hr7yGOdaCC

@ppaler LATAM sigue colaborando con los gobiernos locales y haciendo todos los esfuerzos para continuar operando. Te sugerimos ingresar al siguiente enlace: 
https://t.co/UlMC7rkuQG. Los vuelos especiales serán evaluados y autorizados por las autoridades del país.  Saludos.
@mochi_mike99 Hi, to give you more information, send us via DM your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We await your reply.
@GarandJason Hi, we replied to the message you sent via DM.
@WalaseDiego 😍 ❤️
@anishrsheth Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.

@kiwimexicana Hi, we'll reduce 95% of our operations, you can check this news here: https://t.co/vipp59rUMo.  There won't be available flights from Mexico to Santiago de Chile or from Santiago to Auckland during May. Regards.

@SchertelFC Hi, we suggest erasing the cookies and the browser's history, that can affect our website. If the issue persists, send us an image of the error you are getting, the routes and the full name of the passengers through a DM to verify if there is a booking code generated. Regards.

@marisol_osman Hola Sol, te recomendamos ante esta inconsistencia de nuestra página web eliminar el historial del navegador y también eliminar las cookies del mismo, ya que ante la situación actual del coronavirus la página se encuentra un poco congestionada. Saludos.
@MissKatharina78 Hi, in order to assist you, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and your complete name. We will be waiting for your response. Regards.
@cmarchioni Hello, we'll recommend clearing your web browser's cache, cookies, and history and trying again. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.

@anuragdtu Hello, thank you for reaching us. According to your request, if the ticket was purchased from a travel agency, the refund must be requested directly from them. We will be attentive if you need more information about it. Regards.

@ladykaat1 L Silva, we understand the inconvenience you are having, however we are doing our best for giving the best solution to our passengers. The options you may see are the only alternatives we are able to provide you due to the COVID19 contingency. Regards.
@Nath79356745 Hi, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@shade_tha The travel voucher you get due to a refund is valid for one year: https://t.co/LGKkzJyP0l. Regards.
@Livestron4life Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.

@CPellicane You can request the service through our website, you can verify the instructions, conditions and documents needed using the following link: https://t.co/i7jTpYCOOw. Don't hesitate to contact us for any further information. Kind regards.

@CPellicane Hello, thank you for reaching us, you can travel with an Emotional Support Animal on the route Buenos Aires to Miami, bear in mind that you need to notify us at least 48 hours before the flight departure, and the service is subject to study.

data.text: @El_Salvador31 We replied to the message you sent via DM.
@TheFFOracle Hi, we've sent you a response by DM. Regards.
@JacobBrehme We've sent you a response by DM. Regards.
@HattieMorshuis_ Hi, to help you, send us your booking code, ticket number, your full name and the code given for lost luggage at the airport via DM. We look forward to your response. Regards.

@cristinaimacz Hello, we are still working on your case and your comments are duly noted in order to be taken into account in the resolution. However, it has been required some processes that took more than the expected deadline to deliver a response. We remain tune to your comments. Regards.
@Oceangoingmnky Hi, we sent you an answer via DM. Regards.

@Fire_w Olá, boa tarde. Se você tem um bilhete emitido através de uma agência de viagem e deseja o reembolso, deverá solicitar através do canal emissor da sua passagem. Agradecemos a compreensão e estamos à disposição.
@vanessaG518 We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@tfernandes113 Hi, in order to check the information, please provide via DM the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@BeLikeNee Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and ticket number. Regards.
@HCunalata We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@shade_tha Hi, if you have a Travel Voucher, and to give you more information, send us via DM its number, and the full name of the holder. We await your reply.
@splitFPL Hi, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@djmayo84 We've replied through DM, regards.
@lee91704553 regards!

@Oceangoingmnky Hello, if you travel before April 30th, you don't have to do anything, your ticket will be open to fly until December 31th, 2020. If you fly before may 31th, we invite you to manage your booking, here https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e

@Oceangoingmnky Hello Josh, we invite you to manage your booking, here: https://t.co/HLT3qbm84G
Regards,

@djmayo84 Hi, in order to check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passengers. We'll be awaiting your response.
@fredcfreitas1 We've replied through DM, also, we suggest deleting the mention that has your booking code, since it contains private information. Regards.

@EbonGrace Hi, if your flight ticket was issued by a travel agency, you have to contact them to request your refund. If not, please send us your booking code, ticket number and full name by DM. Regards.
